channel.title: [PI]Skill annoyance.[PI]
channel.description: Okay guys, i'm tired of fucking with my skills. I am going to change all of my skills in my Config.java file to 1. Then I am going to ask a question; Is it possible to make it to where you delete whatever your [Skill].java files say for exp and make it to where, let's use woodcutting. If [player] cuts [logs] they get 50 * config class? if [player] cuts [oak logs] they get 75 * config class. if [player] cuts [willow logs] they get 105 * config class. ETC. [MINING] if [player] mines [copper ore] they get 50 * config class. if [player] mines [iron ore] they get 75 * config class. ETC! And same for Crafting, Fishing, RuneCrafting, Herblore, Thieving, Agility, Basically all skills...

item.title: [PI]Skill annoyance.[PI]
item.dc:creator: @Virgin Virgin
item.description:
@Virgin wrote:

Okay back to this, sorry I was in Georgia watch my older brother graduate US Army BT.
How do I make this where if you use a certain object that it will give you that exp.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Skill annoyance.[PI]
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

[quote=“The Web Guy, post:5, topic:460353”][quote author=Virgin link=topic=563274.msg4105647#msg4105647 date=1347932160]

Subtitute the things of course. I think that’s what your asking…
[/quote]Okay, so… Where does it say the object that makes it give you that amount of exp?

ALSO, I found out that it’s every level I gain, it gives me 2m cash… I don’t want that to happen. How do I fix it?

Search somewhere for

c.addItem(995, 2000000);

I’m pretty sure that’s the correct form of code for PI, if not just search for ‘995, 2000000’[/quote]As I said above it’s c.getItems().addItem(995, 2000000);

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Skill annoyance.[PI]
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

[quote=“Virgin, post:3, topic:460353”][quote author=mr extremez link=topic=563274.msg4105632#msg4105632 date=1347930733]

Subtitute the things of course. I think that’s what your asking…
[/quote]Okay, so… Where does it say the object that makes it give you that amount of exp?

ALSO, I found out that it’s every level I gain, it gives me 2m cash… I don’t want that to happen. How do I fix it?[/quote]

Search somewhere for

c.addItem(995, 2000000);

I’m pretty sure that’s the correct form of code for PI, if not just search for ‘995, 2000000’

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Skill annoyance.[PI]
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

[quote=“Virgin, post:3, topic:460353”][quote author=mr extremez link=topic=563274.msg4105632#msg4105632 date=1347930733]

Subtitute the things of course. I think that’s what your asking…
[/quote]Okay, so… Where does it say the object that makes it give you that amount of exp?

ALSO, I found out that it’s every level I gain, it gives me 2m cash… I don’t want that to happen. How do I fix it?[/quote]Check your playerassistant or something like that it should be in your levelup method just search for c.getItems().addItem(995, 2000000);

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Skill annoyance.[PI]
item.dc:creator: @Virgin Virgin
item.description:
@Virgin wrote:

Okay guys, i’m tired of fucking with my skills. I am going to change all of my skills in my Config.java file to 1.
Then I am going to ask a question;
Is it possible to make it to where you delete whatever your [Skill].java files say for exp and make it to where, let’s use woodcutting.
If [player] cuts [logs] they get 50 * config class?
if [player] cuts [oak logs] they get 75 * config class.
if [player] cuts [willow logs] they get 105 * config class.
ETC.
[MINING]
if [player] mines [copper ore] they get 50 * config class.
if [player] mines [iron ore] they get 75 * config class.
ETC!
And same for Crafting, Fishing, RuneCrafting, Herblore, Thieving, Agility, Basically all skills…

Read full topic
